speaker_turns.text: I need to return these books and pay a fee
Let me check your account. How long are they overdue?
I think just about a week past the due date.
The fee will be $3.50 would you like to renew any of them?
Yes, could I renew the mystery novel for another two weeks?
Hi there! I'd like to order a large cappuccino with oat milk, please.
Of course! Would you like any flavoring syrups with that?
Yes, could I get vanilla syrup, but just one pump?
So think that would be 5.75 would you like your receipt? No I see, me that thank you, I'll pay with card.
I need to reschedule our team meeting for next week
No problem. What day works better for you?
Could we move it to Wednesday afternoon instead of Tuesday?
Wednesday works for me. How about 2 PM?
Perfect, I'll send out a calendar update
Good evening, I'd like to make a reservation for Friday night
I'd be happy to help. How many people will be dining?
There will be four of us, around 7:30 if possible.
Let me check... Yes, we have a table available at 7:30.
Wonderful, please put it under the name Johnson.
I'm having trouble connecting to the office WiFi network.
Have you tried restarting your computer first?
Yes, I did that but it's still not working.
Okay, can you see the network in your WiFi list?
No, it's not showing up at all anymore.
I'd like to schedule a follow-up appointment for my blood test results
When was your last visit with Dr. Miller?
Two weeks ago, on the 14th
She has an opening next Tuesday at 10 AM or Thursday at 2 PM
Tuesday at 10 would be perfect

I'm interested in joining your gym. What membership options do you have?
We offer monthly plans starting at $39.99 or annual memberships at $399
Does the monthly plan include fitness classes?
Basic classes are included, but specialty classes have an extra fee
I'll take the monthly plan then

I need to modify my hotel reservation for next month
I'll help you with that. What's your confirmation number?
It's HB452891
I see your booking for March 15th. What changes would you like to make?
Can I extend it for one more night?

I'd like to book a grooming appointment for my golden retriever
We have openings this Saturday morning. Has your dog been here before?
No, this would be his first time
The full grooming package for large dogs is $85. Would you like 9 AM or 11 AM?
9 AM works better for me
